resources.string: Searching for nothing is not very useful
Sorry, your device is missing geocoder service
Type in this area to search. Tapping on the magnifying glass on the right triggers the search, or you can use your keyboards search button, if it has one.
Tapping on this button moves you to your location. Map will follow your location until you move the map manually. Tapping on it again while following shows you the direction you are facing.
Tapping or pulling up this bar will open selection of map layers
